description:
Hi,

When an LXC instance is delete, we have the error:

2012-05-02 18:24:54 TRACE nova.rpc.amqp   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/shutil.py", line 252, in rmtree
2012-05-02 18:24:54 TRACE nova.rpc.amqp     os.rmdir(path)
2012-05-02 18:24:54 TRACE nova.rpc.amqp OSError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/var/lib/nova/instances/instance-00000019/rootfs/media'
2012-05-02 18:24:54 TRACE nova.rpc.amqp

Here the complete trace: http://pastebin.com/xwpheABu

But not only for "media", it could be other directories.

Nothing particular to reproduce, sometimes it occurs, sometimes not.

Best regards.
title: Permission denied on delete instance
